title: Violent Weather
description: Sometimes the weather can become more than dramatic and develop into something downright dangerous and destructive. Violent Weather details the science behind thunderstorms, tornadoes, and hurricanes and documents their tremendous impact on people and on the land. This book can be used to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships as well as to identify and use closed compound words.
highFrequencyWords: air pressure, cold front, cumulonimbus clouds, Doppler radar, supercell, thunderstorm
